humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, sentinel lymph nodes 1 to 4 from the right axilla were excised and examined. The report specifically mentions 'Negative for metastases (0/1)' for each of the four lymph nodes. This indicates that no metastatic carcinoma was found in any of the assessed lymph nodes. Therefore, based on the rules provided, the N stage for this patient is N0, which means no regional lymph node metastasis.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that sentinel lymph nodes 1-4 from the right axilla were excised and examined, and no metastases were found in any of them (0/1 for each lymph node). Therefore, the pathologic N stage for this patient is N0.
